topic.title: HPE Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 1.1: Sample enviroment.json File for Installing the KVM + ESX Topology

body.p: The process for installing the KVM + ESX deployment requires several JSON files that will be used when deploying the HLM VM.

section.p: The following represents a sample environment.json file. The IP addresses are masked for security purposes. Use values appropriate for your environment.
Return to Installing the KVM + ESX Deployment.

NOTE: The Helion Configuration Processor assigns the first address of the CLM address range to itself for serving python and debian repositories. Make sure that you set the first IP address of the CLM range for the eth2 (CLM) address of the HLM node.
